solution_line_template: The total distance covered from Monday to Wednesday is {monday_distance} + {tuesday_distance} + {wednesday_distance} = <<{monday_distance}+{tuesday_distance}+{wednesday_distance}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles.
So the average distance traveled per day is {total_distance}/{number_of_days} = <<{total_distance}/{number_of_days}={average_distance}>>{average_distance} miles.
